```{r load_data}
data <- read_csv(here("deidentified/convergence_codes.csv"))

data %>%
  gather(person, response, dan, ashley, alex) %>%
  mutate(response = if_else(response == "y", T, F)) %>%
  group_by(target, subject, person) %>%
  summarise(response = mean(response)) %>%
   summarise(response = mean(response)) %>%
   summarise(response = mean(response)) %>%
  arrange(response) %>%
  kable()
```
